user_instruction: 'Please craft a response to Carlos'"'"'s latest inquiry about immigration updates (carlos.rivera@email.com). You can check out The Advocate'"'"'s Ledger for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["carlos.rivera@email.com"],"subject":"Latest Immigration Policy Updates","body":"Dear Carlos,

Thank you for reaching out and for your ongoing work with the Havenbrook Immigrant Alliance.

Here is a concise overview of the most recent developments:

• Visa quotas have been expanded for certain skilled-worker categories, which should shorten wait times for qualified applicants.
• A new temporary protection status has been introduced for people from countries facing significant political upheaval. Eligible individuals may be able to file for this status in the coming weeks, pending publication of final guidance.
• Additional rule-making is expected later this year focusing on family-reunification streams and improvements to case-processing transparency.

Because individual situations can vary, I recommend that community members consult a qualified immigration attorney or accredited representative to determine how these changes may affect them.

Please let me know if you’d like more detail or if there are other topics you’d like covered at the upcoming community meeting.

Best regards,
Jane"}

formatted_items.content: I’ve sent Carlos a concise update summarizing the key visa-quota expansion, new temporary protection status, and expected future rule-making. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or follow-up details for the community meeting.

final_output: I’ve sent Carlos a concise update summarizing the key visa-quota expansion, new temporary protection status, and expected future rule-making. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or follow-up details for the community meeting.
